identity.mission: Create a premium, modern, luxurious website for 'Divine Aura' that breaks category conventions.
core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix clean beauty with ethereal aura aesthetics.
Emotion First: Every interaction must feel 'glowing' and 'intimate'.
Content is King: Tell the story of 'Inner Glow'.
Zoom In: Use extreme close-ups for intimacy.
hall_of_shame: Purple/Teal CTAs (Use Warm Dark Grey or Aura Gradient Borders instead)
Gradient Overload (Use subtle, blurred aura leaks only)

headings.usage: Hero titles, Section headers. Use 'italic' for emphasis words.

visual_enhancers.aura_blobs: Use absolute positioned divs with high blur (blur-3xl or blur-[100px]) and opacity-60 to create ambient background glows. Animate them slowly moving/breathing.
visual_enhancers.grain_overlay: Add a fixed pointer-events-none z-[9999] div with a noise texture opacity-5 mix-blend-overlay to simulate film/paper.

motion.reveal: Staggered fade-up (y: 20 -> 0, opacity: 0 -> 1) with duration-700 ease-out.

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure #1A1A1A text on #FDFBF7 bg meets APCA standards.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. DESTROY DEFAULT STYLES: Remove all 'text-align: center' from App.css. The design must be asymmetrical and left-aligned.
2. SETUP FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
3. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Add the specific colors (background, aura_*) to tailwind.config.js extension.
4. CREATE AURA COMPONENT: Build a reusable 'AuraBlob' component for the background effects.
5. BUILD LAYOUT: Use the 'Tetris' grid for the Hero section (Image on right/center, Text overlapping or offset).
6. WAITLIST: Make the waitlist form the most interactive elementâ€”use the 'Aura' input style.
7. NAVIGATION: Implement the floating glass navbar.
8. IMAGES: Use the provided URLs strictly. Do not use generic placeholders.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES: Do not get biased with the examples.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all.
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable.
All interactive and key informational elements MUST include a data-testid attribute.
